publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2542 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designations of Lead Committee—That the Parliament agrees the following designations of Lead Committee— Justice 2 Committee to consider Act of Sederunt (Fees of Solicitors in the Sheriff Court) (Amendment) 2001, (SSI 2001/438) Justice 2 Committee to consider Act of Sederunt (Fees of Sheriff Officers) 2001, (SSI 2001/439). Supported by: Euan Robson*
